Where am I? Why am I here?
I am sooo hungry, I must find something to eat...

content.speaker: Kalista
content.words:
What!?! I lost my power!
Who is responsible? I will find him!
I WANT MY POWER BACK!

content.speaker: Kalista
content.words:
I think there is a village not so far from here.
I can see some smoke in the south...
Let's go!

content.speaker: Kalista
content.words:

A too long time... But how much?

content.speaker: Kalista

Am I in the right direction?

Hummm... Yes!
You seem to be lost, you should be carefull!

content.speaker: Kalista

content.speaker: Shagir
content.words: Go south, you will find a lovely place called Arabband.

content.speaker: Villager #1
content.words:
It has rained a lot in the last few days.
This rock has fallen from the moutain.
It's too heavy, nobody can move it.

content.speaker: Kalista

Really? I don't want to stay here.
 Who is in charge here?

content.speaker: Villager #1

Nobody, but you can probably ask Grubee, the blacksmith.
He lives in the center of the village.
